title: [Question] Looking for a Capstone Team with AI Domain Interest - B Grader Available
content:
I'm a B grader CSE looking to join a capstone. My primary domain interest is Artificial Intelligence (AI) in general. I'm eager to contribute and learn.
If your team is looking for a member with an interest in AI, please feel free to message me to discuss further. I'm open to various AI sub-domains and eager to collaborate

comments.body: Just curious.. Whats a B grader?
